description: Latest transfer news from Blackburn Rovers and Coventry City.
title: Gossip: Rovers bid for Sky Blues striker
title_page: Gossip: Rovers bid for Sky Blues striker - BBC Sport
maintext:
Blackburn Rovers have made a Â£1.75m bid for Coventry City striker Brandon Thomas Asante, with the Ghana international only making the starting XI once this season for the West Midlands side. (Sky Sports, external)
